lines.text: You *can* put us up for the night, can't you?
We're very tired; we've been traveling all day.
[Mrs. Wilkins whispers something in his ear]
Well, we've only got one room, and that we've been renting mainly to... *married* couples.

[He looks doubtful, then suddenly puts his arm around Irene]
We're married, aren't we, dear?

[big fake smile]
Oh, of course! You see, well, it's been so long that I thought *everybody* knew...
We're respectable churchgoing folk, we are.
And we ain't aimin' to turn no house of our'n into a Sodom and Gomorry.
